=head1 NAME

DiaColloDB::Compat::v0_09::Relation::Unigrams - collocation db, profiling relation: unigram database (v0.09.x)

##========================================================================
## SYNOPSIS
=pod

=head1 SYNOPSIS

 ##========================================================================
 ## PRELIMINARIES

=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

DiaColloDB::Compat::v0_09::Relation::Unigrams
provides a backwards-compatible
L<DiaColloDB::Relation::Unigrams|DiaColloDB::Relation::Unigrams>-like interface
for indices created by DiaColloDB E<lt>= v0.09.x.

=cut
